attributes.action: recognise that sex & nudity are the most natural things in life and should not be suppressed, and that violence (including images of war, and people being shot & knifed) should be illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The world would be a much happier place if sex and nudity were not suppressed on TV and in public places because this is the most natural thing in life and would encourage art & friendship. Whereas the constant portrayal of gratuitous violence and warfare is totally unnatural and offensive and should be made illegal. It is accepted that sexual acts made upon young or non consenting persons should also be classed as an act of violence
